data.text: @waitbutwhy This is so sobering it makes me want to drink but who has time for THAT.

@waitbutwhy @melyacoubi أشاركك هذا الفيديو لأنه حل مضمون لنجاة الإنسانية!

https://t.co/LHvpAQ7YpN

أتمنى لك ولعائلتك وبلدك السعادة في العام الجديد.

آمل أن تستمتع بمشاهدة الفيديو. شكرًا لك.
@waitbutwhy This was such a great piece. I loved it.

@waitbutwhy Tim, I'm a huge fan... But what annoys me about this article is that you keep referring to "covid" as what robbed us of the last couple years of our lives... "Covid" didnt shut down the movie theaters and museums... The government did.
@cag4twit @waitbutwhy Looks nice, but you really think it's true?
@murrman00 @k_janoskova @AdamAlethier @waitbutwhy Let Hafiz have the last word(s): https://t.co/RyYSsneJBo

@waitbutwhy “This is the good news about being a human. The time we have left with family and friends is not a law of nature like the weeks we have left to live. It’s a function of priorities and decisions.”

Awesome.
@waitbutwhy Great article @waitbutwhy and email yesterday.  I like how you picked the color orange as a purely hypothetical example color on your pluralistic ignorance definition
